# 0.22.0

```python
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_rust",
    sha256 = "50272c39f20a3a3507cb56dcb5c3b348bda697a7d868708449e2fa6fb893444c",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/releases/download/0.22.0/rules_rust-v0.22.0.tar.gz"],
)
```

Additional documentation can be found at: https://bazelbuild.github.io/rules_rust/#setup


## What's Changed
* Added tests for build script dependencies to crate_universe by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1943
* Rename crates_vendor_manifests to cvm to shorten windows path lengths by @scentini in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1944
* Support for `no_std` mode by @scentini in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1934
* Add T2 support for thumbv7em-none-eabi by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1957
* Removed `rust_toolchain.os` in favor of `rust_toolchain.exec_triple`. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1960
* feature: expose `extra_rustc_flags` and `extra_exec_rustc_flags` at `rust_register_toolchains` by @rickvanprim in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1959
* fix: lld-link (MSVC) fix flags including `-l` prefix by @rickvanprim in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1958
* Add T2 support for x86_64-unknown-none by @amari in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1967
* Update rules_apple in tests by @keith in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1972
* Allow specifying exec and target compatibility constraints by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1971
* Release 0.22.0 by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1974

## New Contributors
* @rickvanprim made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1959
* @amari made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1967

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/compare/0.21.1...0.22.0

## What's Changed
* Support bzlmod by @cameron-martin in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1528
* Add empty rustfmt.toml by @P1n3appl3 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1907
* Add Rust 1.68.2 by @gferon in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1908
* cc_common_link: also respect --custom_malloc if set by @durin42 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1912
* Fix optional deps by platform by @gferon in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1911
* Handle corner case for windows architecture detection by @FaBrand in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1915
* [wasm-bindgen] Update to v0.2.84 by @oliverek12 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1919
* Exclude target directory from release tars by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1922
* Respect `#[global_allocator]` in `cc_common.link` builds by @scentini in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1926
* Make BuildInfo provider public by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1920
* Added Rust 1.69.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1930
* Updated zlib BUILD file to support darwin-arm64 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1931
* Add support for rustc flags to `rust_proto_library` by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1932
* Release 0.21.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1933

## What's Changed
* Add `render_config` attribute to `crates_vendor`. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1832
* Remove ios/android/wasm support for gen_rust_project deps by @P1n3appl3 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1684
* Fix typo: plced -> placed by @kiron1 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1834
* Fix code example in doc by @kiron1 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1838
* fix: use target_triple struct instead of string by @wcalandro in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1835
* Fix tests for new Apple toolchain by @keith in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1844
* Fix test assertion for arm64 macs by @keith in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1845
* Make rust_clippy providers match rustfmt_test by @0x4da in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1806
* Silence windows build failure by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1863
* Support `[patch]` in crate_universe when using multiple `Cargo.toml`s by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1856
* Updated Rust to 1.67.1 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1864
* Re-enable crate_universe MacOS tests by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1861
* Skip detecting abi for empty values by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1830
* Forward `toolchains` to `cargo_build_script` targets by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1862
* crate_universe: Support fetching crates with git branch, tag or rev by @ted-logan in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1846
* Use `_make_link_flags_darwin` when target os is `ios`. by @thb-sb in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1843
* Add Fuchsia platform support by @P1n3appl3 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1833
* Parallelize cargo tree calls by @JohnAmican in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1874
* Pipe stderr from cargo tree processes by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1879
* Update crate_universe dependencies by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1872
* Make fetch_shas work with mktemp from coreutils 8.32 by @bsilver8192 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1870
* Support sparse indexes by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1857
* Added Rust 1.68.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1866
* Add support for thumbv7em with hard float by @Codetector1374 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1871
* Release rules_rust and cargo-bazel by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1882

# 0.18.0

```python
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_rust",
    sha256 = "2466e5b2514772e84f9009010797b9cd4b51c1e6445bbd5b5e24848d90e6fb2e",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/releases/download/0.18.0/rules_rust-v0.18.0.tar.gz"],
)
```

Additional documentation can be found at: https://bazelbuild.github.io/rules_rust/#setup

## Breaking Changes

- `rust_toolchain.target_json` changed from a label to a string. Users can either move their existing json files into Starlark dicts or convert the sources on the fly with a repository rule (an example can be found in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1810)


## What's Changed
* Unify functions for computing constraint values for platform triple abi by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1805
* Updated platform triple values from strings to structs ("triple") by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1804
* Convert `rust_toolchain` attrs `exec_triple` and `target_triple` to structs by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1808
* Delete `rust_toolchain.rusrc_srcs` by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1807
* Disable job in CI to avoid infrastructure failure. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1816
* Added tests for the `triple` constructor by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1811
* Use correct dynamic link args fro proc-macro crates by @konkers in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1803
* support `resolver = "2"` target-specific features by @wmatthews-google in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1710
* Updated `rust_toolchain.target_json` to take encoded json strings by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1810
* Use env method recently added to cargo_metadata by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1813
* Fixes resolver issue with root packages and another dependency format by @Dig-Doug in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1819
* Encapsulate running cargo into a struct by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1815
* Instructions on how to perform `rustfmt` check (#1822) by @fmorency in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1823
* Added update known shas to include T1-T2 triples by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1824
* Various cleanups by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1828
* Updated rules_rust to version 0.18.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1829

## New Contributors
* @Dig-Doug made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1819
* @fmorency made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1823

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/compare/0.17.0...0.18.0

## What's Changed
* Update clippy and rustfmt aspects to require CrateInfo providers by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1772
* Support `target_settings` in `rust_repository_set` and `rust_toolchain_repository` by @xortive in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1758
* rustdoc_test: substitute the root of the current crate by @bsilver8192 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1777
* Disable broken clang and ldd CI jobs by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1785
* Updated the ios_build example to use `crates_vendor` by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1778
* Download `rustc` in `rustfmt_toolchain_repository` by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1769
* Updated crate_universe dependencies by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1775
* Update docs on setting Rust versions by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1786
* Updated `rust_bindgen` to use `rustfmt_toolchain` by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1770
* Add file:// prefix to env var in docs by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1788
* Added Rust 1.66.1 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1767
* Add "crate-name={}" tag to Crate Universe targets by @alexjpwalker in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1787
* Added compatibility flags to `.bazelrc` to prevent regressions by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1789
* Prevent crates_vendor from restarting bazel. by @matts1 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1791
* Added support for `--nolegacy_external_runfiles` to `rust_doc_test` by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1790
* Have `--experimental_use_cc_common_link` cover `rust_shared_library` by @scentini in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1792
* Fix use of `rustfmt_toolchain` when `rustc` is not provided by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1794
* Fix `cc_common.link` file output name by @scentini in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1795
* Revert "Disable broken clang and ldd CI jobs (#1785)" by @scentini in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1796
* Add `CARGO_BAZEL_REPIN_ONLY` repinning allowlist by @hobofan in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1798
* [crate_universe] add an annotation to disable pipelining by @Calsign in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1733
* rustdoc_test: fix and test OUT_DIR by @bsilver8192 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1779
* Added Rust 1.67.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1799
* Updated rules_rust version to `0.17.0` by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1800

## New Contributors

* @alexjpwalker made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1787
* @hobofan made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1798
* @Calsign made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1733

## What's Changed
* Add `Runfiles::current_repository` to runfiles library by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1713
* Update current_toolchain_files tests to use a dedicated test rule by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1714
* Arm Thumb Embedded Targets. by @konkers in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1721
* Match prerelease versions with annotation wildcard by @jfirebaugh in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1716
* Added CI for minimum supported Rust version by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1720
* Attach debug info outputs to rust tests by @chancila in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1703
* Addressed clippy warnings from `clippy 0.1.67 (ec56537c 2022-12-15)` by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1717
* Support the RUNFILES_DIR environment variable. by @matts1 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1732
* Replace tera template with serde_starlark by @dtolnay in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1734
* Eliminate all use of hash-based collections from crate_universe by @dtolnay in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1737
* Collect targets in a deterministic order by @dtolnay in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1736
* Added `rustfmt_toolchain` and refactored toolchain repository rules by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1719
* Re-pinned all dependencies managed by crate_universe by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1735
* Propagate `compatible_with` attribute to the underlying `_build_script_run` target by @scentini in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1745
* crate_universe re-pinning now defaults to "workspace" by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1723
* Add gen_binaries annotation to control which bins to make target for by @dtolnay in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1718
* Report context on error failing to get version by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1744
* Added CI for single toolchain channel workspaces by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1712
* Exclude generated files from language stats and collapse in code review by @dtolnay in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1747
* Convert BUILD.$name-$version.bazel from tera to serde_starlark by @dtolnay in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1743
* Regenerate BUILD files using serde_starlark renderer by @dtolnay in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1746
* Repin ./examples/crate_universe_unnamed by @dtolnay in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1752

* Fixed `crate.spec` being ignored in `crate_universe` rules. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1174
* Updated crate_universe examples by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1170
* Make `rust_toolchain.llvm_tools` consistent with `rust_std` by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1180
* Cut loading time deps of the import macro by @hlopko in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1177
* process_wrapper: replace C++ implementation with rust. by @gigaroby in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1159
* Remove unused file and use the rules_rust transition allowlist. by @gigaroby in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1182
* Allow specifying additional target triples in rust_register_toolchains() and fix androideabi system by @korDen in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1181
* Populate CFLAGS and CXXFLAGS when invoking cargo build script. by @ddeville in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1081
* add static_library to get_preferred_artifact with pic by @krasimirgg in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1183
* Regenerated `cargo-raze` outputs with v0.15.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1184
* Create internal rust_binary rule instead of using transitions by @dfreese in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1187
* Fix iOS linker arguments by @keith in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1186
* Remove last remains of use_process_wrapper flag. by @gigaroby in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1192
* Fixed crate_universe release tools by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1193
* Updated `crate_universe` dependencies by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1196
* Specify root target for rust_analyzer test by @hlopko in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1189
* Updated `crate_universe` to version `0.1.0`. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1197
* Add a test showing that rust_analayzer aspect traverses aliases by @hlopko in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1188
* Traverse custom alias-like rules in the rust analyzer aspect by @hlopko in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1190
* Added support for producing distribution archives by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1194
* Added release workflow by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1195
* Tweak import macro bootstrap to trick rust analyzer aspect by @hlopko in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1179
* disable advanced features of C++ rules by @krasimirgg in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1200
* Updating `rules_rust` version to `0.1.0`. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1198
